Package model

Class Admin

java.lang.Object
model.Admin
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Admin
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Admin class contains the list of normal users as well as special user stock. This class can manipulate user creation,deletion, and also is used to store the data for the Photos82 application.
Author:
Seok Yim, Mae Khaled
See Also:
Serialized Form

      public static void writeApp​(Admin admin) throws java.io.IOException

      public static Admin readApp() throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
      Reads the data stored for the Admin object.
      Returns:
      the retrieved Admin instance
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if an input or output exception occurred
